option_entry_data.optionCaption: Data items from the Entry Form

item.name: title
item.caption: Title

property.name: name
property.caption: Data name
property.help: The "data name" is the key used to store this element in the data base. This value must be unique across elements in this entry type. It should start with an alphabetic character and not contain any spaces. Legal characters include alphabetic characters (a-z), numeric characters, hyphen and underscore.

property.name: inline
property.caption: Inline
property.help: Mark an item as "Inline" if you want to put multiple items on the same line.

item.help: The Title field must always be included in the entry. It can appear only once, and it cannot be deleted.

property.name: name
property.caption: Data name
property.help: The "data name" is the key used to store this element in the data base. This value must be unique across elements in this entry type. It should start with an alphabetic character and not contain any spaces. Legal characters include alphabetic characters (a-z), numeric characters, hyphen and underscore.

property.name: inline
property.caption: Inline
property.help: Mark an item as "Inline" if you want to put multiple items on the same line.

property.name: required
property.caption: Required
property.help: Marking an item as "required" means that the item must be filled-in before the entry form can be submitted.

property.name: name
property.caption: Selection data name
property.help: Enter a unique name, consisting of lowercase alpha-numeric characters or "_" only, starting with an alphabetic character. This name is used to uniquely identify this selection when it gets stored in the database.

property.name: caption
property.caption: Selection string
property.help: Enter the string to be displayed in the selectbox.

It should start with an alphabetic character and not contain any spaces. Legal characters include alphabetic characters (a-z), numeric characters, hyphen and underscore.

property.name: caption
property.caption: Selection string
property.help: Enter the string to be displayed next to the radio button.

property.name: number
property.caption: Number of file select boxes to be shown

property.name: storage
property.caption: Storage media
property.help: This field specifies where the uploaded files will be stored.
